text: Hey well done Nili- a great presentation. Just one thing- make the text a little bigger and especially the Menu headings. But your work has a great level of charm to it. Now, is there anything you particularly want to know? Just to say my replies to this channel might be a little sporadic as like a lot of managers I'm involved in Coronavirus plans for our organisation- but I'll fit in an answers to your questions as I go....
Thank you so much for taking the time to see my work. Sure, I'll increase the text sizes - my website is still quite on the grassroot level so I'm open to any other feedbacks you have

My questions mainly relate to transitioning from student to a professional artist. I want to be a part of a studio and ideally be an animation artist - how does one go about this? Where do I start and is my current portfolio strong enough to apply to places ?
